channel.title: CVE Feed for ben-sb -- javascript-deobfuscator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ben-sb -- javascript-deobfuscator

item.title: CVE-2024-36120|2024-05-31T16:44:17.180Z -- ben-sb -- javascript-deobfuscator
item.description: javascript-deobfuscator removes common JavaScript obfuscation techniques. In affected versions crafted payloads targeting expression simplification can lead to code execution. This issue has been patched in version 1.1.0. Users are advised to update. Users unable to upgrade should disable the expression simplification feature.
